## While loop

### Perform a task WHILE a condition holds

<img src="Images/WhileLoop.png" style="width: 400px;"/>

---

## While loop

```{r}
i <- 0
while(i < 5){
  print(i)
  i <- i+1
}
```

--- 

## While loop

### Stopping the loop: 'break' statement
```{r}
i <- 0
while(TRUE){
  
  if(i >= 5) break
  
  print(i)
  i <- i+1
}
```
(be careful with infinite loops...)

--- 

## While loop

### Skipping a step of the loop: 'next' statement
```{r}
i <- 0
while(i < 5){
  
  if(i == 1) {
    i <- i + 1
    next
  }
  
  print(i)
  i <- i+1
}
```
('next' is similar to 'continue' in other languages)
